election_record.label: Pennsylvania 1803 Sheriff, Crawford County

overview.note: While Chambers Forster, spelled Foster in one source, appears to have served as Sheriff for about one month in 1803, James Quigley appears to have been elected for the term from November 15, 1803 to October 1806 as indicated in the following: "Sheriffs.-- Alexander Stewart, July, 1800, to October, 1803; Chambers Foster, October 19, 1803, to November, 1803; James Quigley, November 15, 1803, to October, 1806." History of Crawford County, Pennsylvania, 314.

election_record.reference: Original Election Returns. Pennsylvania State Archives, Harrisburg.
Brown, R. C. History of Crawford County, Pennsylvania. Chicago: Warner, Beers and, 1885. 314.
